Place a piece of two-way mirrored glass on a table in front of you. The reflection will appear as if it's in the glass.
Take a photo of yourself with a mirrored surface behind you, such as a shiny wall or a mirrored closet door. The reflection will be visible in the photo.
Use a mirrored compact mirror to see your reflection. The compact mirror is designed to reflect light back to the user, creating a reflection of their face.
Look at your reflection in a puddle of water on the ground. The water will act as a mirror and reflect your image.
Use a virtual reality headset to create a mirrored environment. This will allow you to see your reflection in the virtual world.
